saying: If you want something done well, do it yourself.
description: Kitty is a snooty cat villager appearing in nearly all the games in the Animal Crossing series, except for Animal Crossing: Wild World and Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Kitty's name comes from the word "kitten," the infant form of adult cats. Her original catchphrase is "mrowrr," which looks similar to "meow," the sound cats make. It also looks similar to "more," which may reflect on the greedy lifestyle of a snooty villager.
